mapper.select: select id, code, name, specification, unit, factory, formulation, type, unit_prize, pinyin_code from medicine where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into medicine (code, name, specification, unit, factory, formulation, type, unit_prize, pinyin_code) values (#{code}, #{name}, #{specification}, #{unit}, #{factory}, #{formulation}, #{type}, #{unit_prize}, #{pinyin_code})
mapper.update: update medicine set code = #{code}, name = #{name}, specification = #{specification}, unit = #{unit}, factory = #{factory}, formulation = #{formulation}, type = #{type}, unit_prize = #{unit_prize}, pinyin_code = #{pinyin_code} where id = #{id}
